description:
Brush back overgrown trails on the way to camp and prep the firewood when you get there. Light enough to strap to the side of your pack, this compact machete packs plenty of chopping power. With its full-bellied drop point blade, the Sogfari machete adds mechanical advantage to every swing. Equipped with an aggressive saw-back, you can cut branches and logs that are too thick to chop. And dual up front lanyard holes let you set up a proper chopping lanyard.

  • 3Cr13 stainless steel is quite tough, easy to sharpen, and stands up well to the elements
  • Saw-back, because sometimes sawing makes more sense than chopping
  • Full-tang construction add rigidity and strength
  • Large textured Kraton™ handle offers a great grip, with and without gloves
  • 3 lanyard holes, 2 forward and 1 rear, let you customize your retention set up
  • Textured hammer pommel easily drives stakes into hard ground
  • Nylon sheath has a belt loop and is lined for safety
name: SOG Sogfari Machete 13 in.
